    X, _ = make_blobs(n_samples=10000, centers=centers, cluster_std=0.6)

حساب التجميع باستخدام MeanShift
---------------------------------

.. GENERATED FROM PYTHON SOURCE LINES 28-42

.. code-block:: Python


    # يمكن الكشف عن عرض النطاق الترددي التالي تلقائيًا باستخدام
    bandwidth = estimate_bandwidth(X, quantile=0.2, n_samples=500)

    ms = MeanShift(bandwidth=bandwidth, bin_seeding=True)
    ms.fit(X)
    labels = ms.labels_
    cluster_centers = ms.cluster_centers_

    labels_unique = np.unique(labels)
    n_clusters_ = len(labels_unique)

    print("عدد التجمعات المقدرة: %d" % n_clusters_)

.. GENERATED FROM PYTHON SOURCE LINES 45-66

.. code-block:: Python

    import matplotlib.pyplot as plt

    plt.figure(1)
    plt.clf()

    colors = ["#dede00", "#377eb8", "#f781bf"]
    markers = ["x", "o", "^"]

    for k, col in zip(range(n_clusters_), colors):
        my_members = labels == k
        cluster_center = cluster_centers[k]
        plt.plot(X[my_members, 0], X[my_members, 1], markers[k], color=col)
        plt.plot(
            cluster_center[0],
            cluster_center[1],
            markers[k],
            markerfacecolor=col,
            markeredgecolor="k",
            markersize=14,
        )
    plt.title("Estimated number of clusters: %d" % n_clusters_)
    plt.show()
